channel.title: Kd [pi]
channel.description: Every time you kill someone in pking the kill count and death count go up. If you die in pking then your death count and kill count go up. How do I fix this?

item.title: Kd [pi]
item.dc:creator: @infallibl3 infallibl3
item.description:
@infallibl3 wrote:

go into PlayerAssistant.java and search for: public void applyDead

remove the deathcount variable from the kill method and remove the killcount variable from the death method.

Read full topic
